Bauman, Yoram Yoram Bauman, the World\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds only stand-up economist joins us to talk about his use of humor to demystify economics </summary> <dc:date>2013-06-12T00:00:00Z</dc:date> <dc:creator>Ludovice, Peter J.</dc:creator> <dc:creator>Bauman, Yoram</dc:creator> <dc:description>Yoram Bauman, the World\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds only stand-up economist joins us to talk about his use of humor to demystify economics</dc:description> </entry> <entry> <title>John Bardeen: from Transitors to Superconductivity and Beyond</title> <link href="http://hdl.handle.net/1853/49324" rel="alternate"/> <author> <name>Ludovice, Peter J.</name> </author> <author> <name>Hoddeson, Lillian</name> </author> <author> <name>Hunt, William</name> </author> <author> <name>Daitch, Vicki</name> </author> <id>http://hdl.handle.net/1853/49324</id> <updated>2013-10-28T20:25:00Z</updated> <published>2013-05-15T00:00:00Z</published> <summary type="text">John Bardeen: from Transitors to Superconductivity and Beyond Ludovice, Peter J.; Hoddeson, Lillian; Hunt, William; Daitch, Vicki Lillian Hoddeson and Vicki Daitch, authors of True Genius: The Life and Science of John Bardeen, join us to discuss their biography of the only person to win the Nobel Prize in Physics twice. </summary> <dc:date>2013-05-15T00:00:00Z</dc:date> <dc:creator>Ludovice, Peter J.</dc:creator> <dc:creator>Hoddeson, Lillian</dc:creator> <dc:creator>Hunt, William</dc:creator> <dc:creator>Daitch, Vicki</dc:creator> <dc:description>Lillian Hoddeson and Vicki Daitch, authors of True Genius: The Life and Science of John Bardeen, join us to discuss their biography of the only person to win the Nobel Prize in Physics twice.</dc:description> </entry> <entry> <title>TRIZ - More Than Just a Cool Russian Acronym</title> <link href="http://hdl.handle.net/1853/48282" rel="alternate"/> <author> <name>Ludovice, Peter J.</name> </author> <author> <name>Hipple, Jack</name> </author> <id>http://hdl.handle.net/1853/48282</id> <updated>2013-07-07T22:35:17Z</updated> <published>2013-05-08T00:00:00Z</published> <summary type="text">TRIZ - More Than Just a Cool Russian Acronym Ludovice, Peter J.; Hipple, Jack TRIZ \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd More Than a Cool Russian Acronym Jack Hipple, joins us to discuss TRIZ method for problem solving analysis and innovation. The name TRIZ is an acronym for a Russian phrase that roughly means \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdThe theory or inventor\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds problem-solving.\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd </summary> <dc:date>2013-05-08T00:00:00Z</dc:date> <dc:creator>Ludovice, Peter J.</dc:creator> <dc:creator>Hipple, Jack</dc:creator> <dc:description>TRIZ \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd More Than a Cool Russian Acronym Jack Hipple, joins us to discuss TRIZ method for problem solving analysis and innovation. The name TRIZ is an acronym for a Russian phrase that roughly means \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdThe theory or inventor\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds problem-solving.\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd</dc:description> </entry> <entry> <title>Bees in Trouble</title> <link href="http://hdl.handle.net/1853/48281" rel="alternate"/> <author> <name>Ludovice, Peter J.</name> </author> <author> <name>Hunt, William D.</name> </author> <author> <name>Goodisman, Michael</name> </author> <id>http://hdl.handle.net/1853/48281</id> <updated>2013-07-07T22:33:13Z</updated> <published>2013-05-01T00:00:00Z</published> <summary type="text">Bees in Trouble Ludovice, Peter J.; Hunt, William D.; Goodisman, Michael Michael Goodisman, from the Georgia Tech School of Biology, joins us to discuss Honeybee Colony Collapse Syndrome and its possible connection to a new class of pesticides.. </summary> <dc:date>2013-05-01T00:00:00Z</dc:date> <dc:creator>Ludovice, Peter J.</dc:creator> <dc:creator>Hunt, William D.</dc:creator> <dc:creator>Goodisman, Michael</dc:creator> <dc:description>Michael Goodisman, from the Georgia Tech School of Biology, joins us to discuss Honeybee Colony Collapse Syndrome and its possible connection to a new class of pesticides..</dc:description> </entry> </feed>
